com.jswiff.swfrecords
Class ClipActionRecord

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.ClipActionRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class ClipActionRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class defines an event handler for a sprite. Used within ClipActions.

See Also:
ClipActions, Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
ClipActionRecord(ClipEventFlags eventFlags)
          Creates a new ClipActionRecord instance.
ClipActionRecord(InputBitStream stream, short swfVersion)
          Creates a new ClipActionRecord instance, reading data from a bit stream.

          Returns the action block to be performed when an event occurs.

Creates a new ClipActionRecord instance.

Method Detail

getActions

public ActionBlock getActions()
Returns the action block to be performed when an event occurs. Use this method to add actions to the action block.

Returns:
action block contained in handler

getEventFlags

public ClipEventFlags getEventFlags()
Returns the event flags indicating events this handler is supposed to react upon.

Returns:
event flags

getKeyCode

public short getKeyCode()
Returns the code of the key to trap. The keyPress event flag must be set, otherwise this value is ignored.

Returns:
key code to trap

setKeyCode

public void setKeyCode(short keyCode)

Sets the key code to trap. The keyPress event flag must be set, otherwise this value is ignored.

For special keys (e.g. escape), use the constants provided in KeyCodes (e.g. KEY_ESCAPE). For ASCII keys, use their ASCII code.

Parameters:
keyCode - key code to trap

write

public void write(OutputBitStream stream,
                  short swfVersion)
           throws java.io.IOException
Writes this instance to a bit stream.

Parameters:
stream - target bit stream
swfVersion - SWF version
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occured
